short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SHA Encode any String or Files from a URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SHAEncode any String or File from a URL. Choose from various SHA algorithms in options and press 'Encrypt'.

It also keeps track of your recent works so that you don't have to encrypt/decrypt the same code again and again.


A small Wiki about SHA Encryption
----------------------------------------------
SHA stands for Secure Hash Algorithm which is a family of cryptographic hash functions published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) as a U.S. Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS).
